profiles.description: Results of the matching process. Each element of this array contains the input data and the matching profile, if any.

environment.description: Server that was called (sandbox or production)

output_type.description: A string describing the output of this call

query.description: Data sent to WealthEngine to find a profile.

external_id.description: Your unique id for the individual.

external_id2.description: Your second unique id for the individual.

courtesy.description: Mr, Mrs, Miss, Dr as examples

emails.description: Array of strings each representing an email address

phones.description: Array of strings each representing a non-formatted phone number

postal_code_plus_4.description: Secondary 4 digits of the postal code

first_transaction_amount.description: integer representing the first transaction amount

first_transaction_date.description: first transaction date formatted as YYYYMMDD '20170720'

largest_transaction_amount.description: integer representing the largest transaction amount

largest_transaction_date.description: largest transaction date formatted as YYYYMMDD '20170720'

last_transaction_amount.description: integer representing the most recent transaction amount

last_transaction_date.description: most recent transaction date formatted as YYYYMMDD '20170720'

total_number_transactions.description: integer for total number of transactions

total_years_transactions.description: total number of years transacting with your organization

courtesy.description: Mr, Mrs, Miss, Dr as examples

emails.description: Array of strings each representing an email address

phones.description: Array of strings each representing a non-formatted phone number

postal_code_plus_4.description: Secondary 4 digits of the postal code

custom_attributes.description: object of key value pairs representing custom attributes. Limit to 50.

attr1.description: Representative key value pair for a custom attribute.

profile.description: Details on the person. This will be an empty structure if there is no match to the input.

external_id.description: Your unique id for the individual, copied from query.

external_id2.description: Your second unique id for the individual, copied from query.

custom_attributes.description: Object containing key value paris of custom attributes that were sent as part of the request.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string

courtesy.description: Mr, Mrs, Miss, Dr as examples

text.description: Gender as text, 'Male' or 'Female' as examples

value.description: Gender as an abbreviation, 'M' or 'F' as examples
value representation of status, single character

emails.description: Array of email addresses and types

phones.description: Array of phone numbers and types.

realestate.description: Information about physical properties owned by a person.

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

owners.description: Array of objects about the owner(s) of the property.

items.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

property_valuation.description: Float representing the value of the property in dollars

sales_price.description: Float representing the sales price of the property in dollars

assessed_year.description: The year the property was assessed

historic.description: True or false flag on whether this property is historical

as_of_date.description: Information is valid as of this date, formatted as YYYYMMDD '20170720'

total_num_properties.description: Number of properties owned by this profile

total_real_estate_value.description: Bracketed sum of worth in dollars of this profile's owned property

text.description: Descriptive text for this profile's realestate.total_realestate_value.value bracket

min.description: Lowest possible real estate bracket value (always 1)

max.description: Highest possible real estate bracket value (always 8)

value.description: Value of this profile's real estate ownership bracket

estimated_annual_donations.description: Amount a person is likely to give in 1 year, in dollars

text.description: Descriptive text for this profile's giving.estimated_annual_donations.value bracket

min.description: Lowest possible estimated annual donations bracket value (always 1)

max.description: Highest possible estimated annual donations bracket value (always 7)

value.description: Value of this profile's estimated annual bracket

gift_capacity.description: What a person could possibly give over 5 years

text.description: Descriptive text for this profile's giving.gift_capacity.value bracket

min.description: Lowest possible gift capacity bracket value (always 1)

max.description: Highest possible gift capacity bracket value (always 20)

value.description: Value of this profile's gift capacity bracket

text.description: Text describing this profile's P2G score

value.description: Value of this profile's propensity to give score

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

name.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

range_low.description: Lower bounds of the gift amount

range_high.description: Upper bounds of the gift amount

organization.description: Name of the organization the gift was made to

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

name.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

title.description: Job title associated with this job

historic.description: True if this position is historical

as_of_date.description: Information is valid as of this date, formatted as YYYYMMDD '20170720'

salary.description: Salary as a float (may differ from income)

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

name.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

last_transaction_date.description: the last transaction date, formatted as YYYYMMDD '20170720'

accredited_investor.description: True if the individual is an accredited investor

text.description: Descriptive text for this profile's wealth.networth.value bracket

min.description: Lowest possible net worth bracket value (always 1)

max.description: Highest possible net worth bracket value (always 12)

text.description: Descriptive text for this profile's wealth.total_income.value bracket

min.description: Lowest possible total income bracket value (always 1)

max.description: Highest possible total income bracket value (always 5)

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

name.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

historic.description: True if this biographical information is historical.

as_of_date.description: Information is valid as of this date, formatted as YYYYMMDD '20170720'

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

name.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

total_assets_eoy.description: Total assets at the end of the year

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

name.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

amount.description: Amount of the donation in dollars

quality_of_match.description: A confidence guage for the data source

name.description: This object is used multiple times in the details object.

full_name.description: First, Middle, Last and Suffix combined into one single string.

fir_market_value_assets.description: Float representing the fir market value assets
